insert into t_boss_job_detail (`job_status`, `job_name`, `salary`, `experience`, `degree`, `free_tags`, `company_title`, `company_stage`, `company_scale`, `company_industry`, `job_keyword_list`, `job_sec_text`, `boss_name`, `boss_active_time`, `boss_role`, `company_info`, `company_name`, `company_user`, `res_time`, `company_type`, `manage_state`, `company_fund`, `location_address`, `data_lat`, `encrypt_job_id`, `job_url`, `create_time`) values
( #{item.jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.experience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.freeTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobKeywordList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobSecText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bossName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bossActiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bossRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.manageState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyFund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.locationAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.encryptJobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
